annotation.spannedText: Humans can’t easily protect themselves from the most dangerous species on Earth

classMention.mentionClass: Humans can’t easily protect themselves from the most dangerous species on Earth

annotation.spannedText: After an effective vaccine was developed in the 1930s, yellow fever subsided and an emerging threat took its place: dengue, a flulike sickness so painful that it’s known as “breakbone fever

classMention.mentionClass: After an effective vaccine was developed in the 1930s, yellow fever subsided and an emerging threat took its place: dengue, a flulike sickness so painful that it’s known as “breakbone fever

annotation.spannedText: There’s no evidence that any recent vector-­control interventions, including massive spraying of insecticides, have had any significant effect on dengue transmission

classMention.mentionClass: There’s no evidence that any recent vector-­control interventions, including massive spraying of insecticides, have had any significant effect on dengue transmission

classMention.mentionClass: reports

annotation.spannedText: In the absence of effective mosquito control, vaccines provide the best hope of winning the long game

classMention.mentionClass: In the absence of effective mosquito control, vaccines provide the best hope of winning the long game

annotation.spannedText: I’m very optimistic — and I say this not just because I’ve been working on this for 16 years

classMention.mentionClass: I’m very optimistic — and I say this not just because I’ve been working on this for 16 years

annotation.spannedText: Anna Durbin, a dengue vaccine researcher at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health

classMention.mentionClass: Anna Durbin, a dengue vaccine researcher at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health

annotation.spannedText: If you get infected with dengue 1, and five years later you get another dengue 1, we believe you’ll be protected

classMention.mentionClass: If you get infected with dengue 1, and five years later you get another dengue 1, we believe you’ll be protected

annotation.spannedText: Most people say if a vaccine works even just a little bit, it’s better than nothing

classMention.mentionClass: Most people say if a vaccine works even just a little bit, it’s better than nothing

annotation.spannedText: In the case of dengue, however, “a bad vaccine can be worse than no vaccine. You may actually predispose people to more severe disease

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine is far from ideal

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine is far from ideal

annotation.spannedText: the vaccine may put some children in danger

classMention.mentionClass: the vaccine may put some children in danger

annotation.spannedText: In one clinical trial, immunization appeared to increase the risk of younger children going to the hospital for dengue the following year

classMention.mentionClass: In one clinical trial, immunization appeared to increase the risk of younger children going to the hospital for dengue the following year

annotation.spannedText: Even in volunteers who had been infected with dengue in the past, the vaccine did not raise safety concerns

classMention.mentionClass: Even in volunteers who had been infected with dengue in the past, the vaccine did not raise safety concerns

annotation.spannedText: the vaccine appeared to confer only weak protection to serotype 2, which might leave a gaping hole in immune defense

annotation.spannedText: Sanofi scientists hypothesized that the immune response from the vaccine mimicked a first infection in some of the littlest patients, predisposing them to the dangers of a second round of illness

annotation.spannedText: some scientists have theorized that dengue and Zika may be partners in crime, interacting in some way that allows the Zika virus to cross the placenta

annotation.spannedText: Butantan researchers in Brazil need options sooner, especially for pregnant women

annotation.spannedText: If a woman received a vaccine after she was already infected, her body would not have enough time to develop her own antibodies before the fetus is damaged

annotation.spannedText: It’s very basic, and we know it is safe

annotation.spannedText: Chikungunya is not going away ... We are on the back end of the current epidemic, but there will be another one coming, and we hope to have a vaccine ready in time

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines must overcome tests of logistics, politics and economics

annotation.spannedText: The lesson from yellow fever is especially brutal

classMention.mentionClass: The lesson from yellow fever is especially brutal

annotation.spannedText: The world failed to use an excellent preventive tool to its full strategic advantage
